Reviews.Title: Magnavox TV's.
Reviews.Author: Harold Nelson
Reviews.Content: Gotta love these TV's, I own a couple of them and the picture is great and they hook up to all your AV equipment with real ease.  great Product!.

Reviews.Title: it works though box was damaged
Reviews.Author: Karen Lynne Taylor
Reviews.Content: Package came right away with all paperwork Good picture.  However picture on some stations is fuzzy.  However it is a new television. great color. I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: great value for the price and size
Reviews.Author: Elza Holliday
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy my new purchase. The picture is clear and the price was great. So far, so good. I would purchase it again.

Reviews.Title: Great Little TV
Reviews.Author: DeniseQ
Reviews.Content: Purchased as a gift. Recipient was thrilled with quality of picture and sound. Would recommend this one to anyone looking for a smaller RV. Very lightweight also. Can be moved around easily by an older person.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Hanford CA luvs Amazon "mespouppets_cds"
Reviews.Content: I'm overall quite happy with this product. The TV is easy to use, has a great picture and color too. Piece of cake to set up and attach external components. Sound is fine, much better with external speakers. Seriously can't be beat for the price. I'd buy another. :-)

Reviews.Title: Magnavox 26MF321B-F7 26 in. LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: James Freckleton
Reviews.Content: The Magnavox 26MF321B-F7 26 in. LCD HDTV is a great value, cool looking, sharp picture,brilliant color and fit's great in my kitchen.

Reviews.Title: Did not measure up (literally).
Reviews.Author: John Draver
Reviews.Content: Picture does not extend to corners of screen in "normal" mode. You must change to wide screen or zoom to see a full screen.If you do this you cannot see the graphics for the U-verse in their entirety. I have an LG set also and this does not happen.I will return it and probably buy another LG.

ProductInfo.Features:
26-inch class 720p LCD TV
High-definition LCD WXGA display, 1366 x 768p
TV formats supported 1080p, 1080i, 720p, 480p, 480i
2 HDMI inputs
fun-Link to control all HDMI-CEC Devices via a single remote
ProductInfo.Name: Magnavox 26MF321B-F7 26 in. LCD HDTV
